dcterms:creator: Aleksandr Petrov
Ildar Safilo
Daria Tikhonovich
Dmitry Ignatov
dcterms:description: A new movie and TV show recommendation dataset collected from the real users of MTS Kion video-on-demand platform, based on implicit interactions registered at the watching time, providing rich contextual and side information including interaction characteristics, user demographics, and movie meta-information.
dcterms:title: MTS Kion Implicit Contextualised Sequential Dataset for Movie Recommendation

dcterms:creator: F Maxwell Harper
Joseph A Konstan
dcterms:description: The MovieLens datasets provide historical and contextual information about user ratings and interactions with movies.
dcterms:title: MovieLens

dcterms:creator: James Bennett
Stan Lanning
dcterms:description: The Netflix dataset was released for the Netflix Prize challenge, containing user ratings and interactions with movies.
dcterms:title: Netflix
